part.narration: Yuki walks through the front door of headquarters; Shimizu spreads her arms to block the path.
A single ten-thousand Yen note falls from the heavens. Yuki watches it in awe.
part.line: Don't move. You won't be able to control yourself.
part.narration: Slow motion.A CEO glides by and, in mid-air, seizes the Yukichi. The Sega employees watches idly by. Dramatic landing. Fiery eyes. No applause. From the clouds, a shower of cash. The CEO and his accomplice bask.It is up to the player to remain still for the entire duration of the song and dance.
Dolly out.The CEO and accomplice throw the money around. They dance with each other. They hug each other.
A crane lowers a large-scale model of some sort of two-screened handheld. The top screen flashes.

choice.narration: Weak in the knees, Yuki dashes for the piles of money. Sobbing, she stuffs with money every millimeter of her coat.

Thunder rolls. The Nintendians are gone. Thunder rolls. The crane disappears. Thunder rolls. Rain falls. Yuki is alone with a pile of money. The team passes by in disappointment, ready for a helping of courage water. Ganpu stares at Yuki.

Thunder rolls. The Nintendians are gone. Thunder rolls. The crane disappears. Thunder rolls. Rain falls. Yuki begins to sweep the money into a garbage can. The team helps, smiling, laughing, joking, enjoying each other's company.
